title: About Me
text: My name is Danny Berg, I am a junior sports media and broadcasting double major with minors in theater and history. I am a sports writer for the Daily Nebraskan, a CoJMC Peer Mentor, a broadcaster for Big Ten Plus and KRNU Sports, and the Vice President of Operations for the NRHH chapter on campus.

title: Do college QBs actually improve from year to year?
